title: IS_SCRIPT_GLOBAL_SHAKING
content:
0xC912AF078AF192120x6AEFE6A5// IsScriptGlobalShaking
BOOL IS_SCRIPT_GLOBAL_SHAKING();Returns: Returns true if a scripted global camera shake is currently in effect, otherwise false.Determines if a global camera shake is currently active. You can stop the currently active global camera shake using STOP_SCRIPT_GLOBAL_SHAKING.NativeDB Introduced: v323Examples:LuaJavaScriptC#-- Print whether a global camera shake is currently active
print(IsScriptGlobalShaking())
codeBlocks: -- Print whether a global camera shake is currently active
